long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert dates to the Persian calendar effortlessly!

This extension detects date formats in selected text, guesses the format, and displays the equivalent Persian date using an intuitive tooltip.

Simply select a date on any page to see the converted Persian date!
